website_summaries.verdict: Great value and performance. The older monitor display technology is not angle-proof, but the data itself is fairly accurate.
pros: One sensor provides 5 types of info
Connects to weather websites via app or browser
cons: Some issues w/accuracy, specifically ambient air temperatures

customer_reviews.title: FOOLED ME TWICE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased a 5-in-1 Weather Station and Weather Sensor in August, 2015. The Weather Sensor worked fine for awhile. However, just 15 months later the temperature sensor on the Weather Sensor failed. Because it could not be replaced, I had to buy another complete Weather Sensor.. The temperature gauge in the second one failed just over a year later and the wind direction “rudder” froze and can’t be fixed. I do live on the coast but Acurite said “no problem”. Their Weather Sensors are inferior as far as I have experienced. I’m going with Davis Instruments or Ambient Weather products hereafter. Way better quality but worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Always Looking

customer_reviews.title: Nice out of the box - but doesn't last.
customer_reviews.text: First of all the temperature reading, because it must be placed in the direct sun for wind speed, is not accurate - except at night after the sun goes down. Supposedly an internal solar-powered fan is supposed to keep the temperature accurate. It doesn't. Secondly the humidity sensor quit after 14 months - just out of warranty. (Purchased in March 2015). Newer stations apparently have a humidity replacement sensor that you can purchase and install yourself. Mine is "too old." I would not recommend this station. Other experiences with Acu-Rite instruments are also poor. They simply don't last beyond warranty date.
customer_reviews.author: Fussy Guy Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware. This unit only performed as advertised for ...
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware. This unit only performed as advertised for the first four months. Then my troubles really started when I tried to work with Chaney Instruments. They evidently don't want to honor their warranty. Every time I called them I got little or no service and long waits, no call backs at the time I asked for or any other time. The unit is now offered at prices of 50% off what I paid. High winds affect the rain gauge immediately and at 4 months the temperature didn't record properly. All it shows is -40 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: ZelmoBrink Evans

customer_reviews.title: Massive Connection & Pair Issues at Just 30'
customer_reviews.text: The unit seems to work great for the 5 minutes it's actually connected. The connectivity of this unit is NO WHERE EVEN CLOSE TO 330'. I have to continually repair these units which requires powering down both units and losing all my data. The 14 day learning cycle has yet to complete because I have to keep going through this process daily. My units are only 30' a part with a large window keeping them both in line of site. I've had way cheaper units have A LOT better connectivity. Very disappointed in this product. It will be going back.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Norman

customer_reviews.title: Rain gauge feature does not work
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for a similar unit purchased at Costco previously. The new unit never measured rainfall. I purchased the Asurion Protection Plan along with it. Unfortunately, I am getting no where with Asurion in trying to get a working replacement unit. UPDATE: The replacement unit does not work as well. Amazon was virtually no help as well in getting a replacement unit that actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Tavender

customer_reviews.title: He said that "he likes it" (which is great praise from him LOL) The display is very nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my FIL because he loves to track the weather but the cheap monitors seemed to break every 6 months. He said that "he likes it" (which is great praise from him LOL) The display is very nice, bright with big numbers. The weather ticker(?) was easy to install and is accurate. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: vivi

customer_reviews.title: This my second station in two years both failed with same issue.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these. One in 2015 the other in Nov 2017. Both failed due to the same issue. Outside temp and humidity readings "freeze" on one set of numbers and will not change. I can reset it and it will work for maybe 5 mins. Brought the sending unit inside. Same issue. Changed batteries in both units. Same issue. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Pitchford

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: The product is OK WHEN it works. However, the base unit communicates with the sensor erratically. Sometimes it updates every few minutes, but one time it took 7 hours. We received several inches of rain last evening, according to my old reliable glass tube gauge, but the AcuRite unit only registered 0.32. Battery life is less than 4 weeks. VERY DISAPPOINTED! I tried the chat support and email support. Chat responded, email did not (at least as of the writing of this). Got nothing accomplished. RESULT: returning to AMAZON
customer_reviews.author: J J

customer_reviews.title: A NICE LITTLE WEATHER STATION, GOT US THROUGH HURRICANE MARIA
customer_reviews.text: I got this installed about three days before Hurricane Maria came barreling through Florida. It was great seeing how much rain was actually falling. My partner calibrated the water gauge according to the instructions. We're in Space Coast Florida and we recorded 12" of rainfall during the hurricane. The highest wind peak we recorded was only 22mph but we're very protected with massive pine trees all around our property. The indoor display is very bright and attractive. It lights up the whole kitchen at night. Several of our friends have looked at it and want one now. It is 1/4th cost of our last weather station and does almost all the same things. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark KingTop Contributor: Bass Guitars & Gear

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Unless you want it to last three years and throw away after that. It stopped communicating with the sensor. New batteries, resetting, changing channels did not help
customer_reviews.author: jake64

customer_reviews.title: Junk, junk, junk !
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in Aug of 2017 and have been replacing the sensor and resetting the unit ever since. Now it's dead and they will not help in the least....have to buy a whole new unit. STAY AWAY ! !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joanna S.

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: This thing eats batteries. When it has fresh batteries, which is about every month, it works fine, but then it gets the "low battery" message and stops working. It is July, and about 85 degrees out, and today the AcuRite said it was 40 below outside. We have replaced the batteries each month; it works for about 3 to 4 weeks, then we need to take it down again and put in new batteries. We will toss it and try a different brand. Sadly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: It does not work I Hatteras North Carolina!
customer_reviews.text: My husband needs the wind direction and the wind speed to work.this device did it for a week. We replaced batteries and put it up in an non wind obstructive tower. It still failed. After 2 months replaced the lithium batteries. This model doesn’t work. I want a refund!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customerjeanne

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate for me
customer_reviews.text: Overall disappointed with all weather accuracies, Tried both default and manual settings to obtain some type of accuracy, unit would show rain showers, clouds when there were blue skies and winds locked at no more than 30 mph. Does keep good date and time, Would not recommend or buy again. update: 16 Apr 2020, outside temp stop working all together.
customer_reviews.author: Yme

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this weather station!
customer_reviews.text: The unit worked great for 1 Year then the outside Temp started failing. it would read outside temp -40 in Hawaii. I started trying to contact AcuRite for help and found that the only way you can communicate is thru e-mail. There is no person you can call for customer support! I now have $200 of junk that doesn't work. Do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great concept - major design flaw
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea and most features are great but there is one major flaw. You must install in an open area for rain and wind tracking. This makes the temp and feels like temp inaccurate because they are in full sun. The other day it was 75 outside and sunny so the temp read 90 and feels like showed as 120! We've had this for quite a while so I can't return it big going to purchase an Ambient Weather brand because it comes with a seperate temperatur sensor that can be placed out of direct sunlight for accurate readings b
customer_reviews.author: L. Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work and Acurite support has not responded for assistance.
customer_reviews.text: It worked well for the first 2 weeks. I was out of town for a couple of days. When I returned the display was not receiving from the sensor. I followed all of the troubleshooting steps to no avail. I contacted support on Sunday, 11/25/18. As of today, 11/29/18, I have received no response from Acurite.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Consider other devices. I purchased this unit a year ago and have monitored temperature inaccuracies very closely comparing day and evening indications and comparing with two external temperature gauges and local weather reports. This unit indicates 8 to 12 degrees or more on the high side in direct sunlight, even with the addition two fan option that I purchased. The unit is fairly accurate after sunset and at night. I am dissatisfied and am trashing the device!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: 10 22 Fan

customer_reviews.title: No customer support on item not working
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift 2017. Just before Christmas 2018 it totally quit working for no apparent reason. Have been trying to get customer support for weeks. None of the phone numbers work anymore, no one replies to emails. We are very unhappy with this company.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: What will break first?
customer_reviews.text: I've had 2 of them, and something has broken on both of them. Rain quit on one, then the humidity meter is always at 99% no matter the dew point or humidity. At one time, it was 99 outside and 157 degrees according to the heat index. No one burned alive. THe idea is great, but these are NOT built to last.
customer_reviews.author: S. C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Unreadable
customer_reviews.text: The display has failed and it is no longer possible to read any of the information in the bottom half of the unit face. It has been getting progressively worse with time. Very disappointed in the poor quality. Do not recommend purchasing!
customer_reviews.author: betsymc

customer_reviews.title: Does not last long!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this weather station in November 2019 and it failed on us less than a year later. The rain gauge stopped measuring and the temp gauge became way off. I’m pretty disappointed especially with the cost of this station. Not happy at all. It worked great for the first couple of months but definitely does not last.
customer_reviews.author: KiraM

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 9 months
customer_reviews.text: After 9 months, it no longer gives accurate outdoor temps. It keeps showings low batteries on sensor message I have changed the batteries twice and soon thereafter, the low battery message reappears. In addition, the batteries outside are a pain to change, as you have to remove from the screws to lift the sending unit off the stand. The indoor monitor has a stand that tilts back and makes it hard to read unless propped up more vertical.
customer_reviews.author: 6Xray

customer_reviews.title: Quality disappointment
customer_reviews.text: This started out as a great product, but now not so much because just outside of the period where I can return it the inside display is now malfunctioning, the picture that I have included shows the malfunction under the Rainfall and Previous Events. As you can see on that portion of the display the numbers are not fully displaying the full number digits which is very irritating and my reasoning for only giving this product one star and the fact that I can not return it or get into contact with the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't read or turn off the extremely bright indoor unit.
customer_reviews.text: The weather station itself is great. I'm super happy with almost everything. The information is complete, accurate, it's easy to install and has a very friendly UI. Everything is great except you CAN NOT read the indoor information unit unless you are staring right at it. The indoor unit does not turn off, its extremely bright even on low setting. We had to move it from our bedroom to our kitchen. You can't read the screen from below, above or from the side, just strait on. This is extremely annoying and more than inconvenient!
customer_reviews.author: Scott M Derosier

customer_reviews.title: SUCKS
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dad for Father's Day 2019...it worked for 1 month & then has been nothing but a problem since. It won't work at all. We even called the manufacturer & they tried to talk us through some solutions. Then sent us another "sensor" thinking that was the problem. Well, that worked for 1 week, then nothing again. And to top it all off, all of this happened AFTER the "no return after 30 day" policy from Amazon. HOW CONVENIENT!! That is another thing that sucks & I will be contacting Amazon. You'd think a Prime Member would be able to return past the 30 days, IF the item is defective. DON'T BUY THIS...and ESPECIALLY NOT FROM AMAZON.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product in January and unfortunately did not install it until a few weeks ago due to the weather. I replaced my old one because the wind wasn't registering correctly. Anyways, this morning it said that it was 48 degrees outside as I knew that wasn't correct since there was frost on the ground. I got in my car and my car said it was 28 degrees. I definitely wouldn't purchase this again from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia P.

customer_reviews.title: A good balance of features, quality, and price
customer_reviews.text: This weather station is very easy to set up and use. It provides the weather information anyone simply wanting general weather condition values would want. The inside/outside temperatures, inside/outside humidity, wind speed, and daily rain fall are provided along with barometric pressure trends. It also displays maximum and minimum values recorded to date. For the price this weather station represents a very good value to performance ratio for the casual weather enthusiast.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Pretty happy so far
customer_reviews.text: I found set up and installation fairly easy. The calibrating the rain gauge was a bit time consuming. The worst thing so far is the fact that having the sensor level is important, the bubble level on the sensor is on top of the sensor and pretty hard to see when it is 20ft off the ground. I found it worked best to mount base on a rigid post leveling before raising then using a long level to makes sure the post was straight in all directions.
customer_reviews.author: Dan W

customer_reviews.title: Great for monitoring local weather
customer_reviews.text: This unit does a great job but the outdoor sensor seems to only last for about 1.5 years. I live right by the ocean and we get plenty of salt air and wind so I attribute the relatively short life to the environment. Other than that if does everything we need. I could buy a more professional unit that might last longer but given the price of that upgrade replacing the outdoor sensor is the cheaper route.....
customer_reviews.author: JohnnyCompost

customer_reviews.title: This a neat weather station!
customer_reviews.text: I have never purchased an actualbweather station...This one is probably basic compared to some of the other ones. However this one is pretty darn cool. Its seems extremely accurate, it trackes temp changes very quickly, wind dorection and speed etc...the monitor is very vibrant and easily read. I really like it and would recommend it. This model does not have internet connectivity...meaning you cannot monitor from your phone
customer_reviews.author: Trophytruck

customer_reviews.title: PRODUCT IS INACCURATE!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product! It is totally inaccurate. Doesn't measure the correct amount of rainfall not to mention even the temperature. This is the second one of these I have had and both of them didn't work. I thought the info it was providing was inaccurate, so I bought another one and sure enough....wasn't even close!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: The item is attractive and easy to read
customer_reviews.text: After purchase research shows a good many complaints. Very attractive item but it is being returned to the vendor (at my cost) because it does not work. Shop elsewhere sent back 2 weeks ago waiting for repaired item to be shipped
customer_reviews.author: K. RICKETTS

customer_reviews.title: Only have it up about 3 days but happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Only have it up about 3 days but happy with it. Seems to give accurate info. I imagine you have to take into consideration that temp will be higher if instrument is in the sun. But i like to know what the temp is in the sun because i already know its cooler in the shade. 😊 Easy to assemble. Be aware batteries are not included. They tell you this but I didnt notice it til after i ordered. Not a big deal. It takes 4 lithium AA for outside and 6 good quality alkaline AA for indoor monitor/screen.
customer_reviews.author: ellie belle

customer_reviews.title: Failed shortly after purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this a couple of years ago and overall it's been great except a couple of issues. The color display screen is nice but the text that scrolls across the bottom is messed up. There are several places the text is distorted. It was already installed when we noticed the issue. Some of the readings are terribly inaccurate and the rain gauge stopped working after only a year of use. If the wind blows too hard, it registers rain when there is no precipitation. I will be replacing this and would not buy this model and possibly brand again.
customer_reviews.author: kyle

customer_reviews.title: help desk
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased this unit before. None have lasted very long. This new one is no exception. Called for help to get it set up correctly. All I got was an email telling me to reset to factory settings. No help at all. Very poor quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Eloise Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Husband's Birthday
customer_reviews.text: Husband's former device fell and broke, so I began my search for a replacement weather sensor. This one had great reviews, and I can see why. It installed fairly easy (husband attached it to 4x4, and the 4x4 to a large base, then used a pully-system to hoist it to our flat roof. The monitor is inside our home, and we can see accurate readings for temperature, wind, and rainfall.
customer_reviews.author: Jean M. Gallant

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a while now and think I'll throw it in the trash. Readings are inaccurate compared to other temp gauges I have up around the house. I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: dave olmstead

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing product
customer_reviews.text: The 5 in one sensor stopped working after less than 30 days. called AcuRite technical support. message said to call another number, that number said to send them an email. Got no response. After 2weeks called Amazon support who issued a refund. I would not recommend this product, it is not durable and is not supported.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth C. Gardiner

customer_reviews.title: Works great. We are so thankful we purchased before winter
customer_reviews.text: Works great. We are so thankful we purchased before winter. We only had it not register wind on a couple of days and it was -45 windchill. The solar panel must be working because it wasn't long and it was back to working perfect. We use it to give us conditions for prairie fire fighting along with being able to tell conditions for our cattle. We highly recommend getting this station. I didn't receive anything for my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Dog

customer_reviews.title: What a waste.
customer_reviews.text: So so. It's nice to have the current data, but it's not like it tracks and allows you to see any trends or download the information. If you're a real weather bug, I'd pass. If you just want some wind speed or temperatures at the moment, then there are cheaper options. Update. After just over a year, the outdoor unit has failed. It constantly reads 84 degrees with no new records for rainfall or wind. What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: cpm in Texas

customer_reviews.title: This is a piece of JUNK
customer_reviews.text: It can't even get the indoor temperature correct. We have yet to get the outdoor information correct - temperature, wind, etc. It will say it is raining when there isn't a cloud in the sky. We have reset and changed batteries numerous times without success. Don't waste your money or time on this brand. Since this was a Christmas present we didn't realize how much trouble we were having before we were past the return date and now are past the service date without any useful help from the company.
customer_reviews.author: Figment

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I did not use tech support, so can't give an opinion. (but may in the future-I have found it difficult to set up). Cannot comment on battery life, but I put lithium batteries in and expect theu to last a long time. Also, a friend has one of the weather stations and I believe the batteries have lasted over two years so far.
customer_reviews.author: Magee

customer_reviews.title: Great weather sensor for the amature professional weatherman!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cool weather station with the ability to calibrate if the sensors don't read exactly on target from the manufacturer. I'm kind of wishing that I had purchased the dark version because if I have one complaint, it is that the display is very bright even on the lowest brightness setting. The one challenge in a suburban setting is getting the 5-in-one sensor unit located where it will have good access to winds and rain. Mounting on your deck out back just isn't going to provide that exposure.
customer_reviews.author: T. Geery

customer_reviews.title: This company does not support their product.
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my old weather system with this system and installed it in the exact manner and location, and I have been unable to get it to register wind speed and recently it will not register rainfall. I have tried to contact the company and they have no one to talk with, only the troubleshooting advice on the internet, which is also in the manual, which I have gone through multiple times. I am quite frustrated after spending $112 for the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Malfunctioning within 2 years.
customer_reviews.text: We liked it while it worked, but the rain gauge was always iffy and now it says it’s colderthan Florida ever gets, and resetting did NOT help. Trash within two years? Won’t they replace it, or give a reduced price for our next? We like the display
customer_reviews.author: Roy Demers

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: No complaints so far. Only 2 things I would change at this point. No. 1 it is way too bright, even at the lowest setting. So at night you have a TV-type-glow wherever this is set up. No 2 is that it will only work via being plugged in (the batteries are just for data backup). So you are limited to putting it within reach of a plug. Other than that, works great.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: It's done well
customer_reviews.text: I've had this up for about a week now and it's done well. This was a replacement for an expired Weather Station and it's better. There's a signal strength indicator (a nice surprise) and it shows a booming signal from 35 feet or so, through 1 exterior wall and a floor from 15 feet or so in the air. The base station is very legible. I would buy it again. Update 11/27/2017: I'm still very pleased with this. It's held up well to storms and use.
customer_reviews.author: RCV

customer_reviews.title: I cannot recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived with the rain gauge out of calibration. It took a full half day to calibrate it. After 18 months and several times during that time that I had to reboot it completely stopped working. When I bought it there was customer service help by telephone then it changed to only chat and that did not work well.
customer_reviews.author: AnnBrooks

customer_reviews.title: Good local weather monitoring and record
customer_reviews.text: This product was our second weather station after disappointments with a Taylor model that would stop monitoring and was hard to set up. This model adjusts its own barometer for altitude and calibrates itself over the first few days. It recorded the 45 knot winds last night but missed some when the whole unit was covered with snow and ice--not much can be done about that. We like the summaries as well as the current conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Read the reviews
customer_reviews.text: Purchased April 2018 My unit worked fine for just over a year (Purchased April 2018) . Now the rain and temp. functions do not work.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Bowland

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: Nice product to replace my old weather station. As other reviews have mentioned the daytime temps are off by a few degrees in full sun but other than that I have no complaints. I have mine mounted on the south side of my house about 25 feet off the ground on my TV antenna tower. Took some creative fabricating to fashion a mount as the mount that comes with it seems to be more for attaching to wooded structures. Would like to see other mounting options in with the product. Also make sure you calibrate the rain gauge before mounting it. Mine was measuring almost double the rainfall amounts right out of the box. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Ramblin

customer_reviews.title: Because the unit is placed so it is in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Because the unit is placed so it is in the direct sunlight, the temperature's obviously range 5-10 degrees higher than the protected gauges. My biggest complaint is with the anemometer, however. It is not even close to existing conditions. We live on the coast and are subject to wind gusts and sustained winds and the highest the unit has registered is 21 mph when the gusts have exceeded 45 mph. The unit is place in an unobstructed position to be able to obtain wind speed readings, but it is far from accurate, not sure why.
customer_reviews.author: Red Baron

customer_reviews.title: 5 sensor weather station
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Easy to install. For those mounting on a pole, check that there are raised rings inside the hole. It seemed like there were when I mounted mine. If so they should be sanded down so the pipe will go all the way into the hole. I just turned and pushed past them. You have the chance to check and do better.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Lee Herring

customer_reviews.title: Got this for a gift for my husband and a ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a gift for my husband and a week later, he’s still saying “wow”. We mounted the display unit in our kitchen and the weather unit on our back deck right outside. Every morning, we wake up, check the temperature, wind speed, and wind chill. The husband delights in the wind speed, rain/snow fall, and other data. Now, we’ve only had it a week, so I cannot comment on durability yet, but as far as display and ease of set-up, this thing is top notch.
customer_reviews.author: kwest

customer_reviews.title: doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: Worked pretty good for a year. I tried replacing the batteries but to no avail. Wouldn't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: wave rider

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and Accurate!
customer_reviews.text: Love this weather station! However, try using WD-40 on wind cup spinners before putting it up into a suitable position. Mine froze and I made it kinda difficult to disassemble during winter months so I'm hoping it'll thaw soon...and the receiver has a weird haze so it's hard to read when not full on facing it...other than those 2 things I love this station and even promoted it to several people as well as purchasing exact station for my dad's Christmas present!
customer_reviews.author: Zazzy1

customer_reviews.title: Love this weather station
customer_reviews.text: We replaced out older station with this. Once you get used to weather station you feel like you can't live without one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I loved it when it works but 4 months is ridiculous
customer_reviews.text: This product lasted 4 months. I have tried calling the company and was told I was 34th in line with a wait period of hours. I loved it when it works but 4 months is ridiculous. .
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far works well.
customer_reviews.text: I used this as a replacement for an earlier version of the same weather station that our son-in-law had installed. For some reason, that I was not able to discover after following all directions, the earlier station quit operating after about 1 1/2 years. Since the post was already in place, the set up and operation of this was not difficult. So far it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Homer E. Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install/setup
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to setup. I tested the accuracy against a few other weather stations and it was off a few degrees, but was simple to calibrate and get it corrected. Follow the directions during installation/setup and it will work correctly. Never can go wrong with Acu-Rite. Great products!
customer_reviews.author: Double Eagle

customer_reviews.title: ... have had this about a month and am really glad I made the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have had this about a month and am really glad I made the purchase. The information is very easy to read on the large color display. I only have two minor issues. The first is the rain sensor calibration. The procedure in the manual is tedious. I am going to place a rain guage next to the sensor for a few rainfalls as I adjust the sensor. The second minor issue is with the display brightness. It would be nice if the display could be dimmed more. The display is still very bright on the dimmed setting.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne G.

customer_reviews.title: pillow splitter is great
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying to split tiny blood pressure pills for my cat by hand & they never split the same some big some tiny which was so frustrating. I decided to try the pill cuter it saved so much time. You can put in 6 or so pills at a time & it works great and saves so much time. Was a great purchase
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is my fifth one. They only last about two or three years in south Texas weather. They do give great results
customer_reviews.author: Sherwood Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: The picture says it all. Tried resetting, tried unplugging, everything...
customer_reviews.text: It malfunctioned, the house unit. I can no longer read the screen only after 7 months. Garbage! I can’t figure out how to get another one. The warranty is 1 year. I guess that’s what I get for spending $150 on a janky system. The white bar reads like that. The best feature is toast. Look at it.
customer_reviews.author: Lu

customer_reviews.title: Excellent after warranty repair.
customer_reviews.text: When I first got it I had to replace the batteries for the outdoor device every week (expensive). I contacted AcuRite and they asked me to return it for warranty repair. They returned it to me after 2 months and it worked fine for the next 2 years. Then a tree fell on it, so I replace it with Ambient Weather WS-2902 10-in-1 Wi-Fi, which is also very good.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Londeree

customer_reviews.title: Great weather station, super bright display
customer_reviews.text: My son and husband are weather buffs. Our previous AcuRite station got taken out by a tree limb in a small tornado, so we ordered this as a replacement. It is really easy to see from across the room and has a very useful set of data. It seems very accurate. The only problem is, when plugged in, you can't turn the back light off. It is incredibly bright at night and we have to lay it face down or it shines across the whole house. Not a big deal, but something to keep in mind. Overall, I would really recommend this unit!
customer_reviews.author: mama2boys

customer_reviews.title: Easy seup and easy to read
customer_reviews.text: Have had this weather station for 2 months and am pleased how easy it was to set up. Gives current rain fall, accumlated rainfall, wind, temps, humidity and records past highs and lows.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Not a long life
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this on Prime Day in 2018. It worked great for about 2 years then components started to fail. First the rain gauge then the temperature sensor. At this point it is useless and will have to be replaced. Not a long life for such an expensive piece.
customer_reviews.author: John R.

customer_reviews.title: Had to replace first one
customer_reviews.text: WE had ordered one of these in Aug 2018. Had to replace because of malfunction. Says it has a 2 year warranty and could not reach anyone at Amazon because of Covid 19 to get replacement. Maybe we can get some monetary compensation. Disappointed.....
customer_reviews.author: Andrea K. Pitts

customer_reviews.title: You won't go wrong with this product..,
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I have with this unit is that the temperature sensor is in the wrong location. When the temp was 37 degrees F outside, the reading read 69 degrees F because the sun was effecting the actual temperature reading. This is not the first thermometer design have had this issue with. Everything else is Super! A great tool for my house and the Fire Station for current and up-coming weather. I wish I had time to share more information about the quality and positive results from this product. You won't go wrong by purchasing this and other products from this company. Stan - West Columbia, Texas
customer_reviews.author: Stan Wiggins

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 18 months.
customer_reviews.text: Initially, my Acurite 5 in 1 worked as hoped, but after about 18 months first the outdoor temperature sensor failed, then a few months later the wind-speed and rain gauge failed to report readings to the indoor unit. I tried all the re-setting and other instructions but the outdoor unit is just dead. So disappointing. I won't buy Acurite again. I will rather go with something more expensive and more robust.
customer_reviews.author: R Woodroffe

customer_reviews.title: Quality doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: Station worked fine for several months. During the last few months the wind was not reading right nor the outside temperature. Changed batteries plus worked on the wind directional, worked for a little while then readings were incorrect again. Purchased this unit in June 2019. Not impressed. Unit should last longer. It's over the return date so haven't called Accu-rite. Just very disappointed because to me it was not a cheap unit. It should last much longer than it did.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Nice display and well worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. The display runs off the wall power where batteries are only used if the power goes out. The unit that sits outside runs on solar power but has 4 AAA batteries, 10 AAA batteries are needed. Amazon's price is great. I saw this unit in hammacher schlemmer for $179.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: surprisingly good
customer_reviews.text: Worked reliably so far (four weeks). The screen is brighter than desirable at night - you can't have it in a room without it being lit up. Very functional screen, easy set-up. Don't believe the indoor humidity measurement is accurate (significantly off from two other devices that are relatively consistent with one another). I replaced an older Oregon Scientific weather station with this one and am pleasantly surprised by the upgrade in functionality.
customer_reviews.author: dlj12345

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: I had another weather station that was old and finally stopped working. I really missed it and found this one. Received it, placed in on the old mount (fit perfectly) and I'm back up and working perfectly! I love the color, the lighting and everything about it! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon B

customer_reviews.title: Easy Install
customer_reviews.text: We installed this on our fence in minutes. Calibrating the rain guage we have not done as they want you to drip a cup of water over a 20 minute period into the rain guage. The gauge seems pretty accurate from the factory. The inside unit does take a lot of batteries but without them if the power goes out, you lose all past information such as how much rain for the month, etc. I would recommend this product. I've had it approximately a month.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad since he loves to monitor the weather and what not but he is in absolute love with it! From what he has told me it is very specific and intense with how it tracks, I've been thinking of getting one myself :)
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Nice display
customer_reviews.text: Easy install and the panel display is bright and easy to read. Only time will tell on how long it last but so far it’s been great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: replaced an older model
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my parents to replace their older model and they like it very much....only down side is the screen only stays bright when plugged in soooooo we had to find a new spot for the display unit...other wise great product!
customer_reviews.author: don g1963

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup and the digital rain gauge and rainfall ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup and the digital rain gauge and rainfall history is a really nice feature. Display is easy to read, the only issue is with the viewing angle. When you look at the display from an upward angle the numbers disappear. Not a big enough problem to drop it down to 4 stars, however something that you may need to be aware of if you plan on mounting it on the wall like I did. I just dropped it down a few inches to remedy this.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C

customer_reviews.title: Just like the warranty the unit is now dead
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit May of 2015 it is now January 2017 I just changed the batteries unfortunately the unit seems to be not working for $150 I was hoping to get more than a year-and-a-half out of it seems like they only last as long as the warranty that's why they're so cheap
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Wind not accurate AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: Love this weather station. Rain gauge seems really accurate but the wind gauge, not at all. I live in Jacksonville NC and we are in the middle of Hurricane Dorian. Trees down everywhere and wind gauge says peak wind was 20mph..... yeah WRONG!!!!! Everything else is pretty accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: Set up easy. With one exception good unit. But I have two units that do NOT record daily rain. Only a ongoing total. I now prefer La Crosse weather stations. Just as easy to set up and no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: I am very dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this unit to replacement unit for the one I had that failed. The displays currently in symbols rather than English. It is unusable as is. I tried to contact the manufacturer by email and phone with no response. This current unit only last two and a half weeks prior to failure. I will never spend money on any Acurite unit ever again. This is totally unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted one of these for a long time. The setup was very easy. My only complaint is the display screen is difficult to read unless I am very close to it. The contrast should be sharper and the black lettering/words darker.
customer_reviews.author: joAnne

customer_reviews.title: Use regular batteries as recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I had a problem pairing the in house display and the outside sensor. Deduced that the problem was that I was using heavy duty batteries (which the instructions state not to use). Once I replaced the batteries with 'regular' batteries the two units paired with no problem. I especially like the wind speeds on the display; current, highest and average wind speed.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Superb!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my father, he ended up buying another for his 2nd house. He raves about all its features and durability. I also plan to get another for my new house!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Amateur weather station. Nice electronics!
customer_reviews.text: Love to watch all the information available in real time! Easy to set up! Used small wooden crate from Man Crate to set on. I was able to choose an easy set up location close to the bedroom. Screen Light bright at night, may want to cover.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: We like that a lot
customer_reviews.text: It works well. Our first one finally sun rotted here in Arizona. One of the wind cups blew off. This one is the same as our previous one. The new one has the color read out. We like that a lot. Our old read out device linked up with it once we hit reset. That was a bonus. One weather readout in the living room and one in the kitchen. The signal is good through our block home at approximately 150 feet away. I like the weather recording and the picture of the weather prediction for the day. Really nice and simple.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. shy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic weather station
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh, I bought this weather station as a Christmas gift for my recently retired husband. He loves it. He was outside mounting it as soon as the weather allowed. It has worked perfectly. No complaints. Plus I get frequent weather updates from my own personal weatherman now!! Maybe I have created a monster!! LOL This was my husband's favorite gift in a long time. I am glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: barb

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed in this weather station. It does display accurate information, as far as I can tell, but the only archived data is rain fall. I thought temperature, humidity and wind speed data would be available for review. Not really worth the time or money.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: should have lasted longer
customer_reviews.text: Had this model for 3 years and it's toast. Also have the 01500 series. Been going strong for 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: T. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Weather is important to monitor
customer_reviews.text: Everybody should have one of these. Weather monitoring is a must for us in the mid west and those folks in severe weather prone areas. Easily installed and ready to go. Plus the lighted screen is used as a night light. This is important because if the power quits the unit still works and when in power saving mode can be overridden and the light used in an emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Mike back in Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Pacific Northwest rains
customer_reviews.text: Having a calibration protocol gives reason to believe the accuracy of rain measurements. It is holding up well to a rainy November. After changing batteries, there is no info on re establishing transmission between sensor and display. FAQ do not give a procedure that preserves display history data. Customer support is nonexistent.
customer_reviews.author: Olympic

customer_reviews.title: Potential to be a nice system.
customer_reviews.text: Nice display unit. Fairly easy to set up. Accuracy has a bit to be desired. Humidity reading is way off. Trying to rectify but reading the company's forum it seems this may be a problem. Didn't contact company yet till I try resetting both the sensor and display units. If the humidity worked it wouldn't be a bad system and I'd would probably like it.
customer_reviews.author: Loonytune

customer_reviews.title: We loved this. That was until it quit measuring rain ...
customer_reviews.text: We loved this . That was until it quit measuring rain fall. Started checking into it & found out that spiders LOVE to lay eggs & build nests inside this. The webs tie everything down so it stops working. The company solution is to take it down, clean it out & put a mothball inside to keep spiders out. You have to do this about 1 a month. Screws in plastic aren't supposed to be taken out that often. Now screws won't stay in. The machine works great at first but gets pretty frustrating, pretty fast. WISH there was a much better solution.
customer_reviews.author: cocacolamary

customer_reviews.title: better in warmer climates
customer_reviews.text: I live in Upper Michigan so the water collector to measure rainfall freezes. I don't like that almost all models are plastic but it's holding up well thru blizzards and such. The unit is rather large but does work well.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: AcuRite needs to fix the temperature sensor
customer_reviews.text: I really like this unit which works flawslelly except for the temperature gauge! The unit needs to be placed in the open so that both the wind gauge and the rain gauge will work properly. The problem is, that when the sun hits the unit the little fan, which is solar powered, cannot compensate for the heat generated by the sun hitting the unit's case. The result is that the recorded temperatures are elevated by as much as 10 to 20 degrees! AcuRite needs to fix this issue. I have placed a secondary temperature sensor in the shade in order to get an accurate temperature reading.
customer_reviews.author: Gary G. Guttormsen

customer_reviews.title: Wont buy again.
customer_reviews.text: This little weather device stopped working just after the return date expired. So now I am stuck with an expensive gadget that doesn't work. I wont purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: xexdhtv

product_meta.title: AcuRite 01512 Wireless Home Station for Indoor and Outdoor with 5-in-1 Weather Sensor: Temperature, Humidity, Wind Speed, Direction, and Rainfall, Full Color
product_meta.description: Plan your day with confidence with AcuRite’s Professional Color Weather Station. The weather station features illuminated color displays, indoor and outdoor temperature and humidity, as well as rainfall, wind speed, wind direction, and 24 hour weather forecast. This personal weather station also features heat index, dew point, wind chill and barometric pressure. Your personal weather forecast is calibrated using your own specific weather data and running it through our patented self-calibrating technology to make your forecast a home forecast. This 5-1 Weather Station is easy to setup, includes mounting hardware (pole not included) and features a 2 year battery life for maintenance-free operation. It’s more than accurate, it’s AcuRite.
feature_bullets: Accurately Measure Temperature, Humidity, Wind Speed, Wind Direction and Rain Fall
Includes Weather Ticker for Real-Time Home Weather Updates
Monitor Indoor and Outdoor Conditions with Remote Sensor
Company Based in Lake Geneva, WI, USA - Since 1943

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars2,083 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
